DOC.brief_summary: This study examine behavioral psychological outcome breast density notification use 3-group randomized design compare usual write notification two educationally enhanced approach .
DOC.detailed_description: This 3-group randomized clinical trial compare usual care two educationally enhanced approach breast density notification . Usual care involve send write notification along mammogram report ; woman receive usual care . In addition , woman receive write educational material breast density , without interaction promotora ( culturally congruent health educator ) . Study outcomes include short long term assessment psychological ( anxiety , knowledge ) behavioral ( continued mammography screening , discussion primary care provider ) outcomes . The study also include qualitative inquiry cost analysis .
DOC.criteria: Female Attending screen mammography Mountain Park Health Center Speak English Spanish Male Current diagnosis breast cancer
